Hello again.

Right, well, I know I'm not new, but this is the only part of the form that this really fits in. I've noticed that underneath the username, there's a tagline - mine says "Bottle Rocketeer" - and I was wondering how to change it. I can't find a field in the edit page or anything.

Thank you for any help you may want to give.
Go to settings and then at the bottom of the page there's a menu on the left, find the Edit profile button then scroll down to custom user title

Go to settings and then at the bottom of the page there's a menu on the left, find the Edit profile button then scroll down to custom user title

What he said. Go to Settings, then Edit Profile, then there's a part for a Custom User Title.

Welcome to the forums!
By default that line shows a different title dependant on how many forum posts you've made, so it changes as you post more.
